info.name: StackSuite Just Answers
info.description:
Sometimes you just want the answers
This is that sometimes. 

Also includes a dark theme!
info.additionalInfo:
Update 1 
- Added support for other StackExchange sites
- Renamed the be more accurate to what the CSS does now

Update 2
- Dark scrollbar because it's nice

Update 3
- Not sure if it was an error on my end or a change on theirs, but "code" should now be white

Update 4
- Increased contrast on some code text elements

Update 5
- Found an edge-case with Code Snippets causing the Header to reappear, fixed

Update 6
- They really want you to sign in, but that footer they keep making appear should be gone for now
